short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Split and organize browser tabs into adjustable panels for efficient multitasking. Perfect for research, comparison.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabSpace - 分屏标签管理器通过在浏览器中实现高效的多任务处理，彻底革新您的浏览体验。完美适合研究人员、开发者、作家以及任何需要同时查看多个网页的用户。

主要特性：
✨ 动态分屏
• 将浏览器窗口分割为多个可调整的面板
• 拖动面板边框按需调整大小
• 支持在分屏视图中显示多个标签页
• 流畅响应的面板调整

🎯 智能标签管理
• 自由选择要包含在分屏视图中的标签页
• 可选择在分屏时关闭原始标签页
• 关闭分屏视图时自动恢复原始标签页
• 通过直观的标签页组织保持工作流程

⚡ 高效工作流
• 并排比较内容
• 在面板之间复制和参考信息
• 完美支持研究、购物比较和内容创作
• 通过组织化的工作空间提升生产力

🔒 隐私与安全
• 完全离线工作
• 不收集任何数据
• 仅需最小权限
• 开源代码保证透明度

常见使用场景：
• 研究：并排比较多个来源
• 购物：对比不同网站的产品
• 开发：在编码时查看文档
• 写作：创作内容时参考源材料
• 翻译：同时处理原文和译文
• 社交媒体：同时监控多个信息源

使用技巧：
• 使用面板调整器来改变每个部分的宽度
• 不需要时可以关闭单个面板
• 右键点击扩展图标访问快速设置
• 根据工作流程自定义分屏布局

立即获取 TabSpace，改变您的网页浏览方式！


TabSpace - Split Tab Manager revolutionizes your browsing experience by enabling efficient multitasking right in your browser. Perfect for researchers, developers, writers, and anyone who needs to view multiple web pages simultaneously.

Key Features:
✨ Dynamic Split Screen
• Split your browser window into multiple adjustable panels
• Drag panel borders to resize them according to your needs
• Support for multiple tabs in split view
• Smooth and responsive panel adjustments

🎯 Smart Tab Management
• Choose which tabs to include in split view
• Option to close original tabs when splitting
• Automatically restore original tabs when closing split view
• Maintain your workflow with intuitive tab organization

⚡ Efficient Workflow
• Compare content side by side
• Copy and reference information between panels
• Perfect for research, shopping comparison, and content creation
• Boost your productivity with organized workspace

🔒 Privacy & Security
• Works completely offline
• No data collection or tracking
• Minimal permissions required
• Open source for transparency

Common Use Cases:
• Research: Compare multiple sources side by side
• Shopping: Compare products from different websites
• Development: View documentation while coding
• Writing: Reference sources while creating content
• Translation: Work with original and translated text simultaneously
• Social Media: Monitor multiple feeds at once

Tips:
• Use the panel resizer to adjust the width of each section
• Close individual panels when no longer needed
• Right-click on the extension icon to access quick settings
• Customize your split layout based on your workflow

Get TabSpace today and transform the way you browse the web!
